settings.heading: Other Ways to Buy:
settings.content:
• Order Online by May 13 for delivery to your door in 24-48 hours.
  • Note: for delivery orders placed from May 13th onwards: a surcharge may apply to guarantee your order by Victoria Day. Please contact us for details.
  • Order Online for Curbside Pickup at our Flagship store (Open daily, year-round) at 14 Advance Rd. Etobicoke, ON, M8Z 2T4
  • Questions? Please call us! 416-456-5057
